title: Dynasty Warriors 7
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French. The latest entry in TECMO KOEI's venerable series. Discover the new Jin kingdom and immerse yourself in this 3D-compatible journey!  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".

childDownloads.title: BGM PACK
childDownloads.description: Listen to classic DYNASTY WARRIORS BGM in the CONQUEST/SOUND TEST game modes. This pack includes some of the most popular BGM tracks from DYNASTY WARRIORS 3 through DYNASTY WARRIORS 6.

childDownloads.title: BGM PACK 2
childDownloads.description: Listen to classic DYNASTY WARRIORS BGM in the CONQUEST/SOUND TEST game modes. This pack includes some of the most popular BGM tracks from Dynasty Warriors 2: Xtreme Legends, Dynasty Warriors 5, Dynasty Warriors 6 and Dynasty Warriors 6 Special.

childDownloads.title: COSTUME PACK 0
childDownloads.description: Use the original costumes from the first DYNASTY WARRIORS for Zhao Yun, Xiahou Dun, Lu Bu, Diao Chan and Taishi Ci.

childDownloads.title: COSTUME PACK 1
childDownloads.description: Use costumes from DYNASTY WARRIORS 6 for all 42 characters who appeared in the game. In addition, costumes for Da Qiao, Jiang Wei, Xing Cai, and Zhu Rong are also included.

childDownloads.title: Costume Pack 2
childDownloads.description: Use costumes from DYNASTY WARRIORS 5 for all 46 characters who appeared in the game.

childDownloads.title: COSTUME PACK 3
childDownloads.description: Use costumes from DYNASTY WARRIORS 4 for all 42 characters who appeared in the game, plus 4 additional character costumes.

childDownloads.title: COSTUME PACK 4
childDownloads.description: Use costumes from DYNASTY WARRIORS 3 for all 39 characters who appeared in the game. 4 BGM tracks from DYNASTY WARRIORS 4 and DYNASTY WARRIORS 6 are included in this pack too.

childDownloads.title: Dynasty Warriors 7
childDownloads.description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French. The latest entry in TECMO KOEI's venerable series. Discover the new Jin kingdom and immerse yourself in this 3D-compatible journey!  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".

childDownloads.title: EXCEL STAGE PACK 1
childDownloads.description: The following four additional stages will become available to play in Conquest Mode: Brawl at Taoshui, Siege of Nanpi, Chaos at Puyang, Siege of Mt. Dingjun.

childDownloads.title: JAPANESE VOICE OPTION
childDownloads.description: Play DYNASTY WARRIORS 7 with voices in the original Japanese. After downloading the Japanese Voice Option, go to the "Options" menu under "Sound Settings" - "Voice Language" and select "Japanese" to switch to Japanese voices.

childDownloads.title: LEGEND STAGE PACK 1
childDownloads.description: Play the Guandu and Yiling stages in Conquest Mode, with 3 scenarios remastered from DYNASTY WARRIORS 5 for each stage.  The Guandu stage includes the Battle of Guandu - Cao Cao's Forces, Battle of Guandu - Yuan Shao's Forces and Chaos at Guandu scenarios.  The Yiling stage includes the Battle of Yiling - Wu Forces, Battle of Yiling - Shu Forces, and Breakthrough at Yiling scenarios.

childDownloads.title: LEGEND STAGE PACK 2
childDownloads.description: Play Changban and Wuzhang Plains stages in  Conquest Mode, with 3 scenarios remastered from DYNASTY WARRIORS 4 for each.

childDownloads.title: LEGEND STAGE PACK 3
childDownloads.description: Play the Nanzhong and Hefei stages in Conquest Mode, with 3 scenarios remastered from DYNASTY WARRIORS 3 for each stage.  Added scenarios: Pacification of Nanzhong - Shu Forces, Pacification of Nanzhong - Nanzhong Forces, Fire at Nanzhong, Battle of Hefei - Wei Forces, Battle of Hefei - Wu Forces, Chaos at Hefei.

childDownloads.title: NEW STAGE AND BGM PACK 1
childDownloads.description: This pack features a brand new stage for Conquest Mode: Sanjiang Castle! Three distinct scenarios are available to be played out on this stage, the home of the King of Nanzhong, Meng Huo. Additionally, two sets of BGM music are included, featuring tracks from DYNASTY WARRIORS 5 and DYNASTY WARRIORS 6.

childDownloads.title: NEW WEAPON PACK 2
childDownloads.description: Attack your enemies with two new weapons, the Short Pike and the Mace. The Short Pike is the perfect balance of range and speed and allows counterattacks, and the Mace is very powerful with a wide attack range! Both weapons will be added to your inventory, but you can also create them at the Blacksmith or earn more powerful versions of each weapon by clearing each weapon scenario in Conquest Mode.

childDownloads.title: NEW WEAPON 'Great Axe'
childDownloads.description: Attack your enemies with new weapon, the Great Axe. Mow all your enemies down with ease with the Great Axe! This weapons will be added to your inventory, but you can also create at the Blacksmith or earn more powerful versions of weapon by clearing weapon scenario in Conquest Mode.

childDownloads.title: NEW WEAPON PACK 1
childDownloads.description: Attack your enemies with two new weapons, the Dagger-axe and the Bomb. Grab and slam nearby enemies or perform multi-level attacks with the Dagger-axe, or set the Bomb to explode and cause massive damage! Both weapons will be added to your inventory, but you can also create them at the Blacksmith or earn more powerful versions of each weapon by clearing each weapon scenario in Conquest Mode.

childDownloads.title: NEW WEAPON PACK 4
childDownloads.description: New models for each weapon type will become available to be equipped under WEAPONS. A total of 41 new weapons are included.

childDownloads.title: NEW WEAPON PACK 5
childDownloads.description: New models for each weapon type Pugil Stick and Spiked Shield will become available to be equipped under WEAPONS.

childDownloads.title: NEW WEAPON PACK 6
childDownloads.description: New models for the weapon types Lightning Sword and Arm Blade will become available to be equipped under WEAPONS.

childDownloads.title: NEW WEAPON PACK 7
childDownloads.description: The new weapon types Boomerang and Circle Blade will become available to be equipped under WEAPONS.

childDownloads.title: Original Costume Pack １
childDownloads.description: Use original costumes for the 13 Wei officers including uniforms, suits, high school club outfits, etc. Experience a battlefield like you've never seen with these unique costumes!

childDownloads.title: ORIGINAL COSTUME PACK 2
childDownloads.description: Experience a battlefield like you've never seen with these unique and original costumes for the 16 Wu officers!

childDownloads.title: ORIGINAL COSTUME PACK 3
childDownloads.description: Use original costumes for the 17 Shu officers including uniforms, suits, high school club outfits, etc. Experience a battlefield like you've never seen with these unique costumes!

childDownloads.title: ORIGINAL COSTUME PACK 5
childDownloads.description: Fantasy-style costumes for the 16 characters who debuted in DYNASTY WARRIORS 7 will become available for selection under CHANGE OUTFIT. Experience a fresh take on battlefield action with these new and unique outfits.

childDownloads.title: ORIGINAL COSTUME PACK 6
childDownloads.description: Fantasy-style costumes for the 13 characters from the kingdom of Wei will become available under CHANGE OUTFIT.

childDownloads.title: ORIGINAL COSTUME PACK 7
childDownloads.description: Fantasy-style costumes for the 16 characters from the kingdom of Wu will become available for selection under CHANGE OUTFIT.

childDownloads.title: ORIGINAL COSTUME PACK 8
childDownloads.description: Fantasy-style costumes for the 17 characters from the kingdom of Shu will become available for selection under CHANGE OUTFIT.

childDownloads.title: ORIGINAL COSTUME PACK 9
childDownloads.description: Fantasy-style costumes for the 16 unaffiliated and Jin Kingdom characters will be available for selection under CHANGE OUTFIT.

childDownloads.title: ORIGINAL COSTUME PACK 4
childDownloads.description: Use original costumes for the 16 Jin and Other  officers including uniforms, suits, high school club outfits, etc. Experience a battlefield like you've never seen with these unique costumes!
